lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: Reports have come to us from China that Japanese are using poisonous gas in attacks on Chinese forces in Kinhwa, capital of Chekiang Province. Poisonous gases, however, have been in constant use by Japanese in many other places in the last four years.
abstract: lr urging U S to act against Jap use of poison gas in China
